column2:
[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
The appearance of a member of the Hwarang is rather important, and however harsh it might sound the truth is that your appearance leaves something to be desired. I suggest you put in an effort to improve in that regard.

By my hand and seal,
[hwarang_leader.GetSocietyRank] [hwarang_leader.GetFirstName]
Become Groomed
To complete this mission you need to obtain the Groomed trait, for example by using the relevant society decision.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
A member of the Hwarang is expected to work to ensure that they become or remain a virtuous person, and as such it would be a good idea for you to receive some spiritual guidance from someone well-versed in such manners, such as a priest or scholar.

By my hand and seal,
[hwarang_leader.GetSocietyRank] [hwarang_leader.GetFirstName]
Receive Spiritual Guidance
To complete this decision you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a suitable holy person and choose §YRequest Spiritual Guidance§! and then get their approval

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
A member of the Hwarang is expected to be chaste, which you are not known to be. It would be a good idea for you to strive to improve in that regard.

By my hand and seal,
[hwarang_leader.GetSocietyRank] [hwarang_leader.GetFirstName]
Become Chaste
To complete this mission you need to obtain the Chaste trait, for example from spiritual guidance or self-reflection.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
A member of the Hwarang is expected to be temperate, which you are not known to be. It would be a good idea for you to strive to improve in that regard.

By my hand and seal,
[hwarang_leader.GetSocietyRank] [hwarang_leader.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
There are many things that are of importance for a member of the Hwarang, and at the moment I think you should focus more on your family.

By my hand and seal,
[hwarang_leader.GetSocietyRank] [hwarang_leader.GetFirstName]
Select the Family Focus
To complete this quest you must switch to the Family Focus
I have decided to dedicate myself more to matters related to my family, seeing as that is what I have been told that the other members of the Hwarang think that I should focus on at the moment.
I am sure this will be beneficial!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
There are many things that are of importance for a member of the Hwarang, and at the moment I think you should focus more on warfare.

By my hand and seal,
[hwarang_leader.GetSocietyRank] [hwarang_leader.GetFirstName]
Select the War Focus
To complete this quest you must switch to the War Focus
I have decided to dedicate myself more to matters related to warfare, seeing as that is what I have been told that the other members of the Hwarang think that I should focus on at the moment.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It has come to the attention of the Hwarang that you have worked hard and have become a better person as a result. You truly are an example to all Hwarang!

By my hand and seal,
[hwarang_leader.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
I only did my duty!
